title: Who said it? Trump, Hitler, or Ye

questions.quote: Sorry losers and haters, but my I.Q. is one of the highest -and you all know it! Please don't feel so stupid or insecure, it's not your fault.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: By the skillful and sustained use of propaganda, one can make a people see even heaven as hell or an extremely wretched life as paradise.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I'm a bit sleepy tonight but when I wake up I'm going death con 3 On JEWISH PEOPLE.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I am the chosen one.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: The so-called intellectual classes look down with infinite condescension on anyone who has not been dragged through the obligatory schools.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: For me to say I wasn't a genius, I would just be lying to you and to myself.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: All I know about magnets is this, give me a glass of water, let me drop it on the magnets, that's the end of the magnets.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: The victor will never be asked if he told the truth.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I just told you who I thought I was. A god. I just told you.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: When somebody challenges you, fight back. Be brutal, be tough.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump
questions.context: Personal philosophy detailed in his books

questions.quote: The receptivity of the masses is very limited, their intelligence is small, but their power of forgetting is enormous.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I feel like I'm too busy writing history to read it.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: No politician in history, and I say this with great surety, has been treated worse or more unfairly.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I go the way that Providence dictates with the assurance of a sleepwalker.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: It's a Jewish underground media mafia.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I love the poorly educated.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Obstacles do not exist to be surrendered to, but only to be broken.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I am undeniably, undoubtedly, the greatest human artist of all time.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I think apologizing's a great thing, but you have to be wrong.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: He alone, who owns the youth, gains the future.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: When you hear about slavery for 400 years ... That sounds like a choice.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: They're not coming after me. They're coming after you - I'm just standing in their way.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: The dooming of a nation can be averted only by a storm of flowing passion.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: My ego is my trick to keep me sane.
questions.speaker: Ye
questions.context: Various interviews discussing his mental health

questions.quote: I have a gut, and my gut tells me more sometimes than anybody else's brain can ever tell me.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Strength lies not in defense but in attack.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I will go down as the voice of this generation.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I alone can fix it.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: It is not truth that matters, but victory.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: Every human being has something of value that they brought to the table, especially Hitler.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I am your retribution.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: The broad masses of a nation... more readily fall victims to the big lie than the small lie.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I love Jewish people, but I also love Nazis.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: What separates the winners from the losers is how a person reacts to each new twist of fate.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Anyone who sees and paints a sky green and fields blue ought to be sterilized.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I'm a creative genius and there's no other way to word it.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: They're poisoning the blood of our country.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: All great cultures of the past perished only because the originally creative race died out from blood poisoning.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I can say antisemitic things and Adidas can't drop me. Now what?
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I play to people's fantasies... That's why a little hyperbole never hurts.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Words build bridges into unexplored regions.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I actually can't be Anti Semitic because black people are actually Jew also.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: Any Jewish person that votes for Democrats hates their religion.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Was there any form of filth or profligacy... without at least one Jew involved in it?
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: The Jewish media has blocked me out.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: We will root out the communists, Marxists, fascists, and the radical left thugs that live like vermin within the confines of our country.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: The leader of genius must have the ability to make different opponents appear as if they belonged to one category.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: Society has put up so many boundaries... that it's almost impossible to get a pure thought out.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: Jews have to get their act together and appreciate what they have in Israel - Before it is too late!
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Any violence which does not spring from a firm, spiritual base, will be wavering and uncertain.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I am a proud non-reader of books.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: The late, great Hannibal Lecter. He is a wonderful man. He oftentimes would have a friend for dinner.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I know that fewer people are won over by the written word than by the spoken word.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I am the new Moses.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: If you have a windmill anywhere near your house... the noise causes cancer.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: As soon as one's own propaganda admits even a glimmer of right on the other side, the foundation for doubt... has been laid.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I am fifty percent more influential than Stanley Kubrick, Apostle Paul, Pablo Picasso... and Escobar.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: My fingers are long and beautiful, as, it has been well documented, are various other parts of my body.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: The art of reading and studying consists in remembering the essentials and forgetting what is not essential.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I'm like a vessel, and God has chosen me to be the voice and the connector.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I think if this country gets any kinder or gentler, it's literally going to cease to exist.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I believe today that my conduct is in accordance with the will of the Almighty Creator.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: We have the resources as a civilization to find a utopia, but we're led by the most greedy and the least noble.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: You know what uranium is, right? It's this thing called nuclear weapons. And other things.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: It is always more difficult to fight against faith than against knowledge.
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I am so credible and so influential and so relevant that I will change things.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: My strongest asset, maybe by far, is my temperament. I have a winning temperament.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: All great movements are popular movements. They are the volcanic eruptions of human passions...
questions.speaker: Adolf Hitler

questions.quote: I'm doing pretty good as far as geniuses go.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I'm speaking with myself, number one, because I have a very good brain and I've said a lot of things.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump
